Gresham.Glenn Otto Park:
Glenn Otto Community Park is a 6.38-acre (2.58 ha) park in Troutdale in the U.S. state of Oregon. It is the most heavily used park in the Troutdale park system. The park is at 1102 E. Historic Columbia River Hwy, Troutdale, OR 97060
The park is along the Sandy River and Beaver Creek.
